resources.string: This calculator is used to count combinations and permutations. Suppose you want to select a group of objects from a larger set, and that the order of the objects does not matter. In this case use the Combinations calculator; enter the size of the set under "No. Options" and number of objects under "No. Choices". If the order of the objects does matter select Permutations. Enter the size of the set under "No. Options" and the number of objects under "No. Choices". If you can select the same object multiple times check yes under "Repetitions?" and if not select no.
